content.body: sideshowbarker: is there an equivalent to commit-snapshots/ for snapshots published on TR/? I.e., some kind of index
content.formatted_body: sideshowbarker: is there an equivalent to commit-snapshots/ for snapshots published on TR/? I.e., some kind of index

content.body:
> <@annevk:mozilla.org> sideshowbarker: is there an equivalent to commit-snapshots/ for snapshots published on TR/? I.e., some kind of index

I know only https://www.w3.org/2002/01/tr-automation/tr.rdf
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @annevk:mozilla.org
sideshowbarker: is there an equivalent to commit-snapshots/ for snapshots published on TR/? I.e., some kind of index
I know only https://www.w3.org/2002/01/tr-automation/tr.rdf

content.body: sideshowbarker: I see, that RDF document only lists latest versions and doesn't list the full history as far as I can tell
content.formatted_body: sideshowbarker: I see, that RDF document only lists latest versions and doesn't list the full history as far as I can tell

content.body: might be able to get more from one of the API endpoints at https://api.w3.org/doc#operations-tag-Specifications
…or some series of calls to some of those endpoints
